items.title: Trump-backed candidate Asfura declared new president of Honduras
bullets: • Donald Trump-backed candidate Nasry ‘Tito’ Asfura declared the winner of Honduras’s presidential election

• The electoral council proclaimed a winner before completing the review of all tally sheets

items.title: Algeria passes law declaring French colonisation a crime
bullets: • Law declares France's colonisation of Algeria a crime and demands an apology and reparations
• The two countries are embroiled in a major diplomatic crisis and analysts say that while Algeria’s move is largely symbolic, it is still politically significant
• The legislation lists the ‘crimes of French colonisation’, which include nuclear tests, extrajudicial killings, “physical and psychological torture” and “systematic plundering of resources”

items.title: Hollywood cozied up to AI in 2025 and had nothing good to show for it
bullets: • In 2025, Hollywood really began warming to deploying the kind of gen AI that’s really only good for conjuring up text-to-video slop that doesn’t have all that many practical uses in traditional production workflows
• Despite all of the money and effort being put into it, there's yet to be a gen-AI project that has shown why it's worth all the hype
